title: Multi-Factor Authentication and Secure Login
summary: Implement a secure authentication system with multi-factor login for customers accessing the portal.
description: Build a secure and compliant authentication mechanism that includes support for multi-factor authentication (MFA) options like OTP via SMS, email, or authenticator apps. Establish password policies, session management, account-lockout features, and encryption standards to protect user credentials. The authentication system should integrate seamlessly with the bank’s existing identity management and backend verification services, ensuring complete security compliance.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Create a dashboard tailored to each customer's banking profile and eligibility.
description: Design a dynamic and personalized dashboard interface that displays a summary of the customer's accounts, balances, and eligible banking products. The dashboard should intelligently recommend products or services based on customer behavior, preferences, and eligibility data. It must provide quick access to essential functions such as viewing transaction history, submitting requests, and reviewing notifications, maintaining a clear and intuitive layout.

title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
summary: Ensure the portal offers a consistent experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
description: Develop a responsive front-end using adaptive design principles to ensure portability across multiple devices without compromising usability or performance. The portal must feature intuitive navigation, high accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1 compliance), and optimized load times. Focus on ensuring that critical banking tasks—like viewing balances, updating accounts, or uploading documents—are efficient and straightforward on any platform.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Provide end-to-end workflows for account openings and service changes via the self-service portal.
description: Design and implement guided workflows that simplify account opening, product upgrades, and service modification requests. Minimize the number of required interactions while ensuring compliance with banking regulations like KYC and AML. The workflows should include form validation, real-time eligibility checks, and automated routing to the appropriate internal departments for review and approval, improving turnaround times and minimizing manual intervention.

title: Document Upload and Application Save/Resume
summary: Enable users to upload necessary documentation and save incomplete applications for later completion.
description: Implement secure document upload functionality supporting image and PDF formats, with antivirus scanning, encryption, and validation features. Allow users to save partially completed applications and resume them later from any device, ensuring no data loss or duplication. Store intermediate application data securely and maintain version control for re-submitted forms to support compliance and audit requirements.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time tracking for user requests along with automated notifications.
description: Develop a system that continuously monitors the status of customer requests, such as account openings and service updates. Enable customers to check progress in real time within their dashboard. Integrate email and SMS notifications to inform customers when actions are required, when requests advance stages, or upon completion. Implement an event-driven architecture to ensure instant updates and transparent communication with customers.

title: Comprehensive Interaction and Activity History
summary: Record and maintain an auditable log of all customer interactions within the portal.
description: Develop an auditable logging system that captures every customer interaction, such as logins, form submissions, document uploads, and request lifecycle changes. Implement secure storage and retrieval for this data with robust encryption and retention policies that comply with regulatory standards. Ensure that interaction history is accessible to both customers (for transparency) and authorized internal staff (for compliance and support).

title: Core Banking Integration Layer
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core banking systems to enable real-time synchronization.
description: Develop a secure integration layer that connects the self-service portal with the core banking system through APIs or middleware services. This layer should handle real-time data exchange for account details, balances, and product eligibility. Implement data synchronization, transaction validation, and queuing mechanisms to avoid inconsistencies. Ensure the integration supports scalability, high availability, and alignment with existing IT governance policies.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization
summary: Implement a robust RBAC model to ensure users only access permitted features.
description: Design and configure a role-based access control system across the portal to assign feature visibility and permissions according to predefined roles, such as retail customers, business clients, and administrators. The solution must integrate with authentication services and apply roles consistently across UI, workflows, and APIs. Enable centralized management and auditing of permissions, ensuring compliance with data protection and internal risk policies.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Deploy a dedicated database and ensure optimal performance and reliability of the portal.
description: Implement a dedicated database to store user sessions, requests, logs, and workflow data separately from the core banking database. Focus on performance optimization through indexing, caching, and query optimization strategies. Incorporate data backup, redundancy, and disaster recovery mechanisms to ensure business continuity. Encrypt sensitive data both in transit and at rest, and conduct regular system health monitoring and performance testing.
